attributes.action: Remove the Bill outlawing the possession of extreme pornography.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable right than to his own life. No matter what the content of a video or image, the possesion and viewing of such material has no effect on anyone except the person who views or possesses it. To police what a man can put into his own body and mind is outrageous.
